name: Teleport Slayer
description:
This game is inspired by Nightcrawler from X-Men universe that have the ability to teleport and kill his target, I implement that concept as core mechanic of this game. use left mouse click as teleport button around the level and automatic slain to the enemy if you teleport close enough to them.

this was my first prototype of the game and your feedback will be apreciated and also I was so bad at drawing and designing, that's why I use this minimalism art.
